review: Great port of a classic game to mobile. Build, explore, craft, or just chill with your firends online.
pros: Building is awesome and the different game modes offer many diferent ways to play.
cons: The controls are kinda hard on mobile but you cn connect a bluetooth gamepad to your phone.

review: Another amazing game. Very similar to minecraft but is 2d instead of 3d. There is also way more content. Controls kinda suck.
